meanings.definition: A piece of jewelry consisting of a pendant worn around the neck.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful lavaliere to the party.
meanings.sent2: The lavaliere sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The lavaliere was so shiny, it almost blinded me!
meanings.sent4: Her lavaliere was like a tiny beacon of elegance.
meanings.sent5: The lavaliere dangled gracefully against her neck.

meanings.definition: A small microphone worn around the neck for hands-free use.
meanings.sent1: The speaker used a lavaliere during the presentation.
meanings.sent2: The lavaliere allowed the singer to move freely on stage.
meanings.sent3: The lavaliere whispered secrets to the audience.
meanings.sent4: His lavaliere captured every word with clarity.
meanings.sent5: The lavaliere amplified her voice with precision.
